summary: A salesgirl with plenty of "it" (sex appeal) pursues a handsome playboy.
cast: Clara Bow|Antonio Moreno|William Austin|Priscilla Bonner|Jacqueline Gadsdon|Julia Swayne Gordon|Elinor Glyn|Elmo Billings|Gary Cooper|Lloyd Corrigan|Cheryl Holt|Eleanor Lawson|Rose Tapley|Dorothy Tree
director: Directors: Clarence G. Badger (as Clarence Badger), Josef von Sternberg (uncredited)
title: Ello
